00024 #include "subsystems/radio_control.h"
00025 #include "subsystems/radio_control/ppm.h"
00026 
00027 uint8_t  ppm_cur_pulse;
00028 uint32_t ppm_last_pulse_time;
00029 bool_t   ppm_data_valid;
00030 
00031 void ppm_arch_init ( void ) {
00032   /* select pin for capture */
00033   PPM_PINSEL |= PPM_PINSEL_VAL << PPM_PINSEL_BIT;
00034   /* enable capture 0.2 on falling or rising edge + trigger interrupt */
00035 #if defined PPM_PULSE_TYPE && PPM_PULSE_TYPE == PPM_PULSE_TYPE_POSITIVE
00036   T0CCR = PPM_CCR_CRR | PPM_CCR_CRI;
00037 #elif defined PPM_PULSE_TYPE && PPM_PULSE_TYPE == PPM_PULSE_TYPE_NEGATIVE
00038   T0CCR = PPM_CCR_CRF | PPM_CCR_CRI;
00039 #else
00040 #error "ppm_arch.h: Unknown PM_PULSE_TYPE"
00041 #endif
00042   ppm_last_pulse_time = 0;
00043   ppm_cur_pulse = RADIO_CONTROL_NB_CHANNEL;
00044   ppm_data_valid = FALSE;
00045   ppm_frame_available = FALSE;
00046 }
